page.title: 08FOOD
page.content: My favourite food is Fish and Chips but I eat a lot of other foods as well. Chinese food is perhaps the most common food in our house as all the family are mad on it. My favourite Chinese dish is fried chicken and sweet and sour pork or a pancake roll. That is made from a light batter filled with prawns and all different kinds of fried things that I wouldn't like to try and identify. I also like Indian food but not as much as Chinese food. Fom what you have just read you may think that I eat nothing but fish and chips and foreign food but I do eat other things as well. A popular meal at home is steak in either onion, curry or tandoury sauce. Come to think this probably makes even that a foreign dish. Ah well- c'est la vie and all that!
